org.openimaj.math.matrix

Class ThinSingularValueDecomposition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.math.matrix.ThinSingularValueDecomposition

  • public class ThinSingularValueDecomposition
extends Object
    Thin SVD based on Adrian Kuhn's wrapper around ARPACK. This can scale to really large matrices (bigger than RAM), given an implementation of Matrix that is backed by disk.

    Note that the current version of (Java)ARPACK is not thread-safe. Allowances have been made in this implementation to synchronize the call to SingularValues.decompose() against the ThinSingularValueDecomposition class. Care must be taken if you are using JARPACK outside this class in a multi-threaded application.

    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
